channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Poems by Heart
item.description: Memorized any poems lately? It’s a worthy exercise, often a pleasure.

item.title: ‘A Public-Shaming Penalty’: Appeals Court Strikes Down NASDAQ Corporate Board Diversity Rules
item.description: A major court victory for keeping power constrained by law and woke capital focused on capital, not wokeness.

item.title: Corrupt Media Obsess Over Luigi Mangione After Memory Holing Trump’s Would-Be Assassins
item.description: The media builds a mystique around an alleged murderer while ignoring two gunmen who targeted a presidential candidate.

item.title: Landmark Transgender SCOTUS Case Could Reshape A Doctor’s Oath To ‘Do No Harm’
item.description: Transgender treatments make doctors adjust their risk assessment to accept iatrogenic side effects as a necessary cost of treating patients.

item.title: Wray’s Resignation Won’t Undo Trauma His FBI Foot Soldiers Caused Innocent Families
item.description: Despite Wray’s announcement that he will step down, the effects of his heavy-handed leadership leaves scars on his victims.

item.title: Montana Supreme Court blocks ban on transgender surgeries, prompting outcry from GOP lawmaker, supporters
item.description: A Montana Republican lawmaker is criticizing a state Supreme Court's decision to continue blocking a ban on transgender surgeries for minors.

item.title: GOP Sen. Murkowski says she's 'not attached to' GOP label, but is 'still a Republican'
item.description: Sen. Lisa Murkowski indicated that she is not wedded to the Republican label, but has never abandoned it.

item.title: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi injured, hospitalized while traveling to Luxembourg
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi suffered an injury and has been admitted to a hospital in Luxembourg.

item.title: Dems Call Trump A Threat To Democracy Because He Can Turn Their Lawfare Back On Them
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is apparently a threat to democracy because he has the power to use the DOJ the way Democrats did against him.

item.title: The Musk Factor
item.description: Musk brings a boundless optimism and can-do verve, and he’s a healthy new ingredient to Trump’s populist mix.

item.title: Eight Antitrust Reform Ideas for the Republican Trifecta
item.description: As with other areas of the law, the Biden-Harris administration routinely weaponized antitrust enforcement to pick economic winners and losers.
